title: File a Filing Extension
description: A taxpayer is not ready to file their return by the deadline and needs to file an extension.

tasks.description: Gather the taxpayer's basic information (Name, SSN, Address).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects the required personal information.

tasks.description: Estimate the taxpayer's tax liability and determine if a payment should be made with the extension.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent estimates the tax due and advises the taxpayer to make a payment to avoid penalties.

tasks.description: Prepare and e-file Form 4868, Application for Automatic Extension of Time To File.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully submits the extension form to the IRS.
